#include <stdio.h>
#include <set>


using namespace std;

int main()
{
	multiset<int> s1, s2;
	int t, choice, rating, size;
	multiset<int>::iterator f;
	multiset<int>::reverse_iterator r;
	
	size = 0;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t--){
		scanf("%d", &choice);
		if(choice==1){
			size++;
			scanf("%d", &rating);
			if(size<=3) s1.insert(rating);
			else{
				f=s2.begin();
				if(*f < rating){
					int element = *f;
					s2.erase(f);
					s2.insert(rating);
					s1.insert(element);
				}
				else s1.insert(rating);
			}
			if(size%3==0){
				r = s1.rbegin();
				int element = *r;
				s2.insert(element);
				s1.erase(s1.find(element));
			}
		}
		else{
			if(size<=2) printf("No reviews yet\n");
			else{
				f = s2.begin();
				printf("%d\n", *f);
			}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
